visualcryptography.canvas
Class ImageCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  visualcryptography.canvas.ImageCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ImageCanvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel

ImageCanvas holds all the operation that draws the image onto the panel.

Since:
6.24.05
Author:
Edward P. Legaspi

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Invoked by swing to draw components. Draw the image on the panel. Should not invoked paint directly, but used the repaint method to schedule the component redrawing instead.

Overrides:
paint in class javax.swing.JComponent

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Ba±os, Laguna. All rights reserved.
